org.dbflute.mail.send.embedded.receptionist

インタフェース SMailDynamicTextAssist


  • public interface SMailDynamicTextAssist
    導入されたバージョン:
    0.4.0 (2015/05/16 Saturday at nakameguro)
    作成者:
    jflute

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド デフォルト・メソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      default void accept(SMailDynamicPropResource resource, SMailDynamicPropAcceptor dynamicPropAcceptor)
      Accept dynamic property from prepared dynamic data, called if dynamic data exists.
      org.dbflute.optional.OptionalThing<String> assist(SMailDynamicTextResource resource)
      Assist dynamic text from prepared dynamic data, called if dynamic data exists.
      org.dbflute.optional.OptionalThing<? extends Object> prepareDynamicData(SMailDynamicDataResource resource)
      Prepare dynamic data for dynamic property and dynamic text.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • prepareDynamicData

        org.dbflute.optional.OptionalThing<? extends Object> prepareDynamicData(SMailDynamicDataResource resource)
        Prepare dynamic data for dynamic property and dynamic text. 
         e.g.
  o select data from database by templatePath and other resoures.
  o return DB result for this.accept and this.assist()
        パラメータ:
        resource - The resource of dynamic data. (NotNull)
        戻り値:
        The optional dynamic data from e.g. database for accept(), assist(). (NotNull, EmptyAllowed: then no accept(), assist())

      • accept

        default void accept(SMailDynamicPropResource resource,
                    SMailDynamicPropAcceptor dynamicPropAcceptor)
        Accept dynamic property from prepared dynamic data, called if dynamic data exists.
        パラメータ:
        resource - The resource of dynamic property. (NotNull)
        dynamicPropAcceptor - The acceptor for dynamic property of postcard. (NotNull)

      • assist

        org.dbflute.optional.OptionalThing<String> assist(SMailDynamicTextResource resource)
        Assist dynamic text from prepared dynamic data, called if dynamic data exists.
        This method may be called twice in one mail sending, for plain text and html text.
        パラメータ:
        resource - The resource of dynamic text. (NotNull)
        戻り値:
        The optional dynamic text from e.g. database. (NotNull, EmptyAllowed: means no dynamic text)
